org.hyperledger.fabric.contract

Interface Context

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ChaincodeStub

    public interface Context
extends ChaincodeStub
    This context is available to all 'transaction functions' and provides the transaction context. It also provides access to the APIs for the world state. ChaincodeStub Applications can implement their own versions if they wish to add functionality.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface org.hyperledger.fabric.shim.ChaincodeStub
